description:
Dan is a 21 year old skater who we found at a local tattoo shop.
Dan has girls lined up all over town and can hardly find any free time of his own. When he decided to take a break and show us what he had to offer we could not turn him down. We are glad that he did because Dan turned out to be one of the most well hung males we have had here at Next Door Male. Hope you enjoy!
We're happy to bring you Dan, in all his glory, for you to watch while he gets down to some very serious, private business.
title: Dan
